p:
Patients who entered the study could also participate on a voluntary basis in a subproject with the goal to test whether mirabegron can restore the nestin + niche and may have a beneficial effect on BM morphology and the degree of myelofibrosis. BM trephine biopsies were performed at study entry and at week 24. Reticulin and collagen fibrosis was evaluated following established criteria.
